document_data.name: The Black Flagon
document_data.mainbody: The '''Black Flagon''' was a popular tavern in [[Memnon]], [[Calimshan]], owned and staffed by a family of [[Sprite (creature)|sprites]].
document_data.Location: The tavern was located in the middle of Memnon, right on the shore of the [[River Agis]].

Interior.Atmosphere: Although the Flagon was anything but a quiet tavern, with little privacy to be had, it was a popular meeting place.

document_data.Services: Prices at the Black Flagon were somewhat more expensive than the norm, made up for in part by the swift and energetic sprite staff.
document_data.Defenses: The sprites had several [[magic item]]s concealed within the tavern to facilitate the removal of unruly guests and also had an [[adventurer|adventuring]] troupe named the [[Flagon Five]] on their payroll for protection.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Although it was not common knowledge that the Black Flagon was owned by sprites, patrons were careful to avoid insulting the staff lest they be kicked out.
